XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="Demo.PEX.Production.RemoteInboundAdapter" LogGeneralTraceEvents="false"> <Description></Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="Demo.PEX.BusinessService" Category="" ClassName="Demo.PEX.BusinessService" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="true" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="CallInterval">5</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="%gatewayPort">55555</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="%gatewayExtraClasspaths">C:\PEXDemo\DemoPEX.exe</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="%remoteClassname">InterSystems.Demo.PEX.InboundAdapter</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="%remoteSettings">min=11 max=99</Setting> </Item> </Production>
